entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -7,771,000 reported in the network role http://www.mz.pl/role/ias_1_role-420000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 7,771,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.mz.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400B2YUOXNE1TPY77/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl.zip/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl/reports/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl.xhtml 18505

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -17,198,000 reported in the network role http://www.mz.pl/role/ias_1_role-420000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 17,198,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.mz.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400B2YUOXNE1TPY77/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl.zip/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl/reports/esef_msz_2021-12-31_pl.xhtml 18505
